home.servicesDesc: From Hanfu rentals to themed parties, we offer a comprehensive cultural experience.
home.feature1Desc: A variety of styles for daily wear and special occasions.
home.feature2Desc: Create exclusive Hanfu-themed experiences for private and corporate events.
home.feature3Desc: Exquisite accessories and creative products to adorn your Hanfu life.
home.feature4Desc: Professional partner photographers to capture your beautiful moments.
home.galleryDesc: Every piece of Hanfu carries the warmth of history, every glance captures the spirit of the East.
home.stepsDesc: Embark on your journey through time in just three simple steps.
home.step1Desc: Browse our Hanfu collection and choose your favorite style and size.
home.step2Desc: Select a convenient time for an in-store fitting or delivery.
home.step3Desc: Visit our store or receive your package to begin your Hanfu journey.
home.testimonialsDesc: Hear what our friends who have sought classical beauty with us have to say.
home.testimonial1: The Hanfu styles here are authentic and the fabric is very comfortable. I felt like I had truly traveled back in time!
home.testimonial2: We chose a Hanfu theme for our company event, and Cloudloom's service was impeccable, from costumes to event planning.
home.testimonial3: My first Hanfu photoshoot exceeded all expectations. The clothes were new and clean, and the accessories were complete.
home.testimonial4: As a history teacher, I'm glad to see a platform promoting traditional culture. The garments are historically accurate and highly recommended.
home.faqDesc: Answering your common questions about the Hanfu experience.
home.faq1Q: Is a deposit required for Hanfu rental?
home.faq1A: Yes, a deposit is required to ensure the integrity of the garments. It will be fully refunded upon the safe return of the Hanfu.
home.faq2Q: Do you offer makeup and styling services?
home.faq2A: We currently offer basic makeup advice and accessory pairing. For complex styling, we can recommend professional partner stylists.
home.faq3Q: What if the Hanfu is damaged during the rental period?
home.faq3A: Please contact us immediately upon discovering any damage. Depending on the extent, a repair or replacement fee may be deducted from the deposit. Please refer to our rental agreement for details.

vision.subtitle: Our Vision
vision.title: A Bridge Between Cultures, Woven in Silk.
vision.desc: We are more than just a Hanfu store. We are cultural ambassadors, dedicated to bringing the timeless elegance of ancient Chinese attire to the heart of Dublin. Our mission is to create an immersive space where East meets West, and history comes to life.

founder.title: A Note from Our Founder
founder.quote: Living in Dublin for over a decade, I've always been captivated by the rich tapestry of Irish culture. At the same time, I felt a deep longing to share the stories woven into the silks of my own heritage. Hanfu is not just clothing; it’s a tangible piece of history, a poem you can wear. I started this journey to create a welcoming space for Dubliners and visitors alike to not just see, but truly experience the profound beauty of Chinese culture. This is my invitation to you – to step into another world, right here in Dublin.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.desc: Three principles guide everything we do.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.desc: We honour history. Each garment is meticulously researched to ensure its form and patterns are true to its dynasty.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We believe in tangible beauty. We use only the finest silks, cottons, and linens to recreate the textures of the past.

experience.title: Experience
experience.desc: We offer more than just clothing. We provide a cultural deep-dive, from themed parties to educational workshops.

zhang.name: Mr. Zhang
zhang.bio: A historian at heart with a decade of experience in historical garment reproduction. His expertise ensures every piece tells an accurate and beautiful story.

osullivan.name: Aoife O’Sullivan
osullivan.bio: A Dublin native with a passion for cross-cultural events. Aoife bridges the gap, ensuring our experiences are both authentic and perfectly tailored for a local audience.

join.title: Begin Your Journey
join.desc: Follow our story on social media or book an appointment to visit our showroom in Dublin. We can't wait to welcome you.

collaboration.headerDesc: Introduce an unforgettable touch of ancient culture to your Dublin-based business. We provide unique Hanfu-themed experiences that captivate audiences and create lasting memories. Let's collaborate.
collaboration.trackRecordDesc: We've already created amazing experiences with fantastic local partners.
collaboration.case1Desc: We provided a full range of Tang Dynasty costumes for their quarterly feature project. The series gained over 50k likes on Instagram and was featured in a local art blog.
collaboration.case2Desc: We co-hosted a cultural theme night, providing costumes and interactive activities. The event was sold out and increased the venue's social media engagement by 300% that week.
collaboration.partnerModelsDesc: We offer two core partnership programs designed for mutual success.
collaboration.photographerDesc: Elevate your portfolio with the timeless beauty of Hanfu. We provide access to our extensive collection, helping you create stunning, culturally rich visuals that stand out.
collaboration.photographerBenefit1: Exclusive discounts on our entire Hanfu collection for your shoots.
collaboration.photographerBenefit2: First access to our newest and most elaborate outfits.
collaboration.photographerBenefit3: Co-promotion opportunities on our social media channels.
collaboration.photographerBenefit4: Priority consideration for our official commercial projects.
collaboration.venueDesc: Host a unique "Hanfu Night" and offer your patrons an extraordinary experience. We provide a turnkey themed party package, driving new footfall and generating buzz for your venue.
collaboration.venueBenefit1: A complete, all-inclusive event package: costumes, host, and activities.
collaboration.venueBenefit2: Attract new customers and significantly boost your venue's profile.
collaboration.venueBenefit3: Cross-promotion on our platforms to a culturally-engaged audience.
collaboration.ctaDesc: Ready to explore a partnership? Leave your email below, and our collaboration specialist will get in touch within 24 hours.

gallery.bannerDesc: Explore the art of clothing across millennia, each piece embodying the essence of Chinese civilization.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.goBrowse: Go explore and add your favorite Hanfu!

header.subtitle: A Journey Through Time
header.title: The Story of Hanfu
header.desc: Discover the rich history and elegant forms of traditional Chinese clothing. Hanfu is not just a garment; it's a legacy of artistry and philosophy worn through dynasties.

timeline.title: An Evolving Silhouette
timeline.desc: Journey through the major dynasties and witness how Hanfu transformed over centuries. Click on a dynasty to learn more.

han.name: Han Dynasty
han.desc: The Han Dynasty established the foundational aesthetics of Hanfu. Garments were often voluminous and flowing, emphasizing grace and modesty. The 'Shenyi' (deep robe) was a signature one-piece garment for both men and women.
han.feature3: Layering was common for formal wear.

tang.name: Tang Dynasty
tang.desc: A golden age of culture, the Tang Dynasty saw a more open and diverse style. Influenced by the Silk Road, fabrics were vibrant and designs were bolder. Women's fashion, in particular, became more relaxed and expressive.
tang.feature2: Low-cut necklines and short jackets for women.

song.name: Song Dynasty
song.desc: The Song Dynasty favored a more reserved and refined aesthetic. The clothing became more slender and simple, reflecting the era's neo-Confucian philosophies. The Beizi, a straight-cut overcoat, was popular.
song.feature3: Use of delicate and natural colors.

ming.name: Ming Dynasty
ming.desc: The Ming Dynasty revived and developed upon earlier styles, especially from the Tang. It featured a wide variety of clothing, from majestic court robes to practical daily wear, known for its intricate patterns and buttons.
ming.feature1: Pleated skirts and jackets with buttons.
ming.feature2: Diverse styles for different social classes.

styles.title: Iconic Styles of Hanfu
styles.desc: While there are hundreds of variations, here are a few fundamental styles that form the basis of Hanfu.

ruqun.name: Ruqun (襦裙)
ruqun.desc: A two-piece outfit consisting of a top (Ru) and a skirt (Qun). The height of the waistband varied by dynasty, with the high-waisted Tang style being particularly famous.

shenyi.name: Shenyi (深衣)
shenyi.desc: A long, one-piece robe that wraps around the body, symbolizing the harmony of heaven and earth. It was a formal garment, common in the Han Dynasty.

beizi.name: Beizi (褙子)
beizi.desc: A versatile overcoat with a straight, parallel collar, worn by both men and women. It was particularly popular during the Song and Ming Dynasties for its simple elegance.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: What is the main difference between Hanfu and a Kimono?
faq.a1: While they share a common ancestor, they are very different. Hanfu is a broad category of historical Chinese clothing with many styles, typically featuring a cross-collar closed to the right and sashes. A Kimono is the traditional Japanese garment, which has a much more standardized T-shape, a wider obi (sash), and distinct sleeve styles.
faq.q2: Is it okay for non-Chinese people to wear Hanfu?
faq.a2: Absolutely! Wearing Hanfu is a form of cultural appreciation. We welcome everyone to experience its beauty, as long as it is worn with respect for its history and cultural significance. It's a wonderful way to engage with Chinese culture.
faq.a3: The term translates to 'clothing of the Han people.' It refers to the historical clothing system of the Han ethnic majority in China, spanning thousands of years before the Qing Dynasty.

parties.heroDesc: Whether it's a birthday celebration, team building, or a gathering of friends, we create a unique and immersive cultural experience for you.
parties.whyDesc: We offer more than just costumes; we provide a cultural feast that travels through time.
parties.feature1Desc: Hundreds of exquisite Hanfu from various dynasties and styles to ensure every guest finds their perfect outfit.
parties.feature2Desc: Our partner stylists will create historically fitting and personally tailored makeup and hairstyles for you and your guests.
parties.feature3Desc: No need to find a photographer. We offer professional photography services to capture every wonderful moment.
parties.themesDesc: We have meticulously designed a variety of themes to meet your different social and event needs.
parties.theme1Title: Poets' Gathering by the Winding Stream
parties.theme1Desc: Recreate the elegant gatherings of ancient scholars. Guests wear Jin-style Hanfu, sit on the floor, and experience activities like pitch-pot, zither playing, and tea tasting.
parties.theme1Feature1: Ideal for team building, cultural salons
parties.theme1Feature2: Includes tea ceremony and zither performance
parties.theme1Feature3: Provides a full set of antique-style props
parties.theme2Desc: Relive the bustling scene of the Lantern Festival. The venue is decorated with gorgeous lanterns, and guests can enjoy riddle guessing, lantern making, and eating sweet dumplings.
parties.theme2Feature1: Perfect for family gatherings, birthday parties
parties.theme2Feature3: Venue decorated with a lantern theme
parties.theme3Desc: Hold a solemn and magnificent coming-of-age ceremony for a young lady. Dressed in opulent Tang-style Hanfu, she completes this important life ritual witnessed by family and friends.
parties.theme3Feature2: Includes a professional master of ceremonies
parties.bookingDesc: Four simple steps to easily start your exclusive party.
parties.step1Desc: Tell us your party idea, number of guests, and budget online or by phone.
parties.step2Desc: Our planner will create a tailor-made party plan just for you.
parties.step3Desc: Confirm the plan details and pay the deposit to secure your date.
parties.step4Desc: On the scheduled day, simply arrive and enjoy everything we've prepared for you.
parties.ctaDesc: Contact our party planner now and let's turn your vision into reality. We are happy to assist with detailed consultations or initial quotes.

recognition.q1_title: Question 1.1: Can you identify which of the following is Hanfu (the traditional dress of the Han Chinese people)?

recognition.feedback_incorrect_prompt: Oops, that's a beautiful costume, but not quite Hanfu! Give it another try.
recognition.feedback_incorrect_text: Hanfu is the traditional clothing of the Han Chinese people. It has a history of thousands of years and is distinct from other East Asian traditional attire like the Kimono or Hanbok.

payment.q_title: Question 4.1: Please consider the following service packages and vote for what you believe is a reasonable price point.
payment.price_prompt: What do you think is a reasonable price?

packageA.title: Package A: Basic Experience
packageA.description: Choose one Hanfu set, includes simple hairstyling and basic accessories, 1.5 hours of free shooting in an indoor themed scene (using your own phone).

packageB.title: Package B: Professional Photoshoot
packageB.description: Choose one Hanfu set, includes full professional makeup and hairstyling, 2-hour indoor shoot with a professional photographer, all digital proofs provided with 5 retouched photos.

packageC.title: Package C: Dublin Outdoor Photoshoot
packageC.description: Choose one Hanfu set, includes full professional makeup and hairstyling, 3-hour follow-along shoot with a professional photographer at a chosen Dublin landmark, all digital proofs provided with 8 retouched photos.
